hero.name: Need
hero.info: Affordable Prices, Fast Process, Guaranteed Services. Explore the website and immediately contact us

about.name: History
about.first_paragraph: Kotocell is a counter that was previously a laundry business, founded in 2018 and still operating till today.
about.second_paragraph: Until now, Kotocell has served more than 10 thousand total happy customers and already has 3 branches in islandwides, 2 others are Selmacell and Since Store.
about.third_paragraph: Kotocell has a vision to be a productive and progressive business according to needs and also a mission to prioritize and make loyal customers shop at its store
about.quotes: Happiness is not in money, but in Kotocell
